attributes.action: Make party manifestos at elections legally binding agreements.
attributes.additional_details: To avoid the public being deceived by false election pledges which completely change when in power.
attributes.background: Legally binding policy that all future election manifestos become legally binding documents. A formal contract between the successful party and the public.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Make breaking a manifesto against the law and trigger a General Election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700035
